title: Improve error message when core.properties already exists on CoreAdmin CREATE command
description:
When CoreAdmin CREATE is called and core.properties already exists, the resulting error message is not informative to somebody who is not familiar with CoreAdmin internal operation.


Error CREATEing SolrCore 'foo': Could not create a new core in C:\Users\sheisey\Downloads\solr-6.5.1\server\solr\fooas another core is already defined there

comments.content: The error message in master is different than branch_6x, and even less informative.
comments.author: Shawn Heisey

comments.content: Patch for branch_6x that does not include a CHANGES.txt update.
comments.author: Shawn Heisey
